feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
